date.description: The date corresponding to the data entry.

channel_id.description: The unique identifier for the YouTube channel.

video_id.description: The unique identifier for the video where the card is displayed.

live_or_on_demand.description: Indicates whether the video was streamed live or on-demand at the time of card display.

subscribed_status.description: Indicates whether viewers were subscribed or unsubscribed to the channel.

country_code.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code where the data is collected.

card_type.description: The type of card displayed on the video (e.g., playlist, associated website).

card_id.description: The unique identifier for the card displayed on the video.

card_teaser_impressions.description: The total number of times the teaser of the card was shown to viewers.

card_teaser_clicks.description: The total number of clicks on the teaser of the card.

card_teaser_click_rate.description: The rate at which viewers clicked on the teaser of the card among those who saw the teaser impressions.

card_impressions.description: The total number of times the card was shown to viewers.

card_clicks.description: The total number of clicks on the card within the specified time frame.

card_click_rate.description: The rate at which viewers clicked on the card among those who saw the card impressions.
